name: Sandwitch Shop
description:
Play as Dizzy, a witch who wants to poison the king! To do this, she opens up the Sandwitch Shop! Controls: Left/Right: Rotate/Toggle Left+Right: Deselect Down: Action Q) How does it relate to the Chrono Theme? A) Our game has a time component for every order, each days well as growing, toasting, and cooking food. Q) I can't win, is this game winnable? A) Yes! It does take a little bit of practice, but you can definitely make it to the end!

Credits:

Programmers: Westin Montano, Niko Udria, Hao Mai, Prathmesh Jain

Artists: Leilia Lin, Karina Montano

Sound Designer: Connor Ellis
